QuestData.Title: What's Under There?
QuestData.Description: It is done.$b$bWith this enchantment, not only can you roam amongst the goren freely, but you can move as they do.$b$bYour travels through the canyon are now made easier. You have safe access to places otherwise impossible to reach.$b$bPerhaps these tunnels will lead to more information that could be used against the Iron Horde.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the goren disguise to explore locations in Gorgrond.

Objectives.Objective: See where the first tunnel leads
See where the third tunnel leads
Take the tunnel back to Breaker's Crown
See where the second tunnel leads
